   20: 
   21: -module(bs_size_expr_SUITE).
   22: -compile(nowarn_shadow_vars).
   23: 
   24: -export([all/0,suite/0,groups/0,init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   25:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   26:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   27:          basic/1,size_shadow/1,complex/1,
   28:          recv/1,no_match/1]).
   29: 
   30: suite() ->
   31:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   32:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   33: 
   34: all() ->
   35:     [{group,p}].
   36: 
   37: groups() ->
   38:     [{p,[],
   39:       [basic,
   40:        size_shadow,
   41:        complex,
   42:        recv,
   43:        no_match]}].
   44: 
   45: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   46:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   47:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   48:     Config.
   49: 
   50: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   51:     ok.
   52: 
   53: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   54:     Config.
   55: 
   56: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   60:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   61:     Config.
   62: 
   63: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   64:     ok.
   65: 
   66: basic(_Config) ->
   67:     <<>> = do_basic(<<1:32>>),
   68:     <<"abcd">> = do_basic(<<2:32,"abcd">>),
   69:     no_match = do_basic(<<0:32>>),
   70:     no_match = do_basic(<<777:32>>),
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: do_basic(Bin) ->
   74:     Res = do_basic_1(Bin),
   75: 
   76:     Res = do_basic_2({tag,Bin}),
   77:     Res = do_basic_2([list,Bin]),
   78:     6 = do_basic_2({2,4}),
   79: 
   80:     Res = do_basic_3(Bin),
   81:     Res = do_basic_4(Bin),
   82: 
   83:     {result,Res} = do_basic_5(Bin),
   84:     case Res of
   85:         no_match ->
   86:             ok;
   87:         _ ->
   88:             {result,{Res,7777777}} = do_basic_5(<<Bin/binary,7777777:32>>)
   89:     end,
   90: 
   91:     Res.
   92: 
   93: do_basic_1(<<Sz:32,Tail:(4*Sz-4)/binary>>) ->
   94:     Tail;
   95: do_basic_1(<<_/binary>>) ->
   96:     no_match.
   97: 
   98: do_basic_2({tag,<<Sz:32,Tail:(4*Sz-4)/binary>>}) ->
   99:     Tail;
  100: do_basic_2([list,<<Sz:32,Tail:((Sz-1)*4)/binary>>]) ->
  101:     Tail;
  102: do_basic_2({A,B}) when is_integer(A), is_integer(B) ->
  103:     A + B;
  104: do_basic_2(_) ->
  105:     no_match.
  106: 
  107: do_basic_3(Bin) ->
  108:     WordSize = id(4),
  109:     case Bin of
  110:         <<Sz:32,Tail:(WordSize*Sz-WordSize)/binary>> ->
  111:             Tail;
  112:         _ ->
  113:             no_match
  114:     end.
  115: 
  116: do_basic_4(Bin) ->
  117:     WordSize = id(4),
  118:     F = fun() ->
  119:                 case Bin of
  120:                     <<Sz:32,Tail:(WordSize*Sz-WordSize)/binary>> ->
  121:                         Tail;
  122:                     _ ->
  123:                         no_match
  124:                 end
  125:         end,
  126:     F().
  127: 
  128: do_basic_5(Bin) ->
  129:     WordSize = id(4),
  130:     F = fun() ->
  131:                 Res = case Bin of
  132:                           <<Sz:32,Tail:(WordSize*Sz-WordSize)/binary,More:(8*WordSize)>> ->
  133:                               {Tail,More};
  134:                           <<Sz:32,Tail:(WordSize*Sz-WordSize)/binary>> ->
  135:                               Tail;
  136:                           _ ->
  137:                               no_match
  138:                       end,
  139:                 {result,Res}
  140:         end,
  141:     F().
  142: 
  143: size_shadow(_Config) ->
  144:     12345678 = size_shadow_1(),
  145:     ok.
  146: 
  147: size_shadow_1() ->
  148:     L = 8,
  149:     Offset = 16,
  150:     Fs = [fun(<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>) -> B end,
  151:           fun(<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>) -> B end,
  152:           fun(A) ->
  153:                   Res = (fun([<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>]) -> B end)([A]),
  154:                   Res = (fun([<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>]) -> B end)([A])
  155:           end,
  156:           fun(A) ->
  157:                   Res = (fun({<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>,<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>}) -> B end)({A,A}),
  158:                   Res = (fun({<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>,<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>}) -> B end)({A,A}),
  159:                   Res = (fun({<<L:L,B:(L+16)>>,<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>}) -> B end)({A,A}),
  160:                   Res = (fun({<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>,<<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>}) -> B end)({A,A})
  161:           end,
  162:           fun(A) ->
  163:                   <<Size:L,_/bits>> = A,
  164:                   Inner = fun([L], {#{key1 := <<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>,
  165:                                       key2 := <<L:L,B:(L+Offset)>>}, L}) -> B end,
  166:                   Inner([Size], {#{key1 => A,key2 => A},Size})
  167:           end],
  168:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, <<16:8, 12345678:32>>).
  169: 
  170: size_shadow_apply([F|Fs], Arg) when is_function(F, 1) ->
  171:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, Arg, F(Arg)).
  172: 
  173: size_shadow_apply([F|Fs], Arg, Res) when is_function(F, 1) ->
  174:     Res = F(Arg),
  175:     size_shadow_apply(Fs, Arg, Res);
  176: size_shadow_apply([], _, Res) ->
  177:     Res.
  178: 
  179: -record(r, {a,b,c}).
  180: complex(Config) ->
  181:     (fun() ->
  182:              Len = length(id(Config)),
  183:              Bin = << <<I:13>> || I <- lists:seq(1, Len) >>,
  184:              <<Bin:(length(Config))/binary-unit:13>> = Bin
  185:      end)(),
  186: 
  187:     (fun() ->
  188:              V = id([a,b,c]),
  189:              F = fun(<<V:(bit_size(<<0:(length(V))>>)*8)/signed-integer>>) ->
  190:                          V;
  191:                     ({A,B}) ->
  192:                          A + B
  193:                  end,
  194:              -1 = F(<<-1:(length(V)*8)>>),
  195:              7 = F({3,4})
  196:      end)(),
  197: 
  198:     (fun() ->
  199:              A = a,
  200:              B = b,
  201:              F = fun(<<A:16,B:16,C:(A+B),D/bits>>) ->
  202:                          {A,B,C,D};
  203:                     (<<A:16,B:16>>) ->
  204:                          {A,B};
  205:                     (<<A:8,B:8>>) ->
  206:                          {A,B}
  207:                  end,
  208:              {13,21,16#cafebeef,<<"more">>} = F(<<13:16,21:16,16#cafebeef:34,"more">>),
  209:              {100,500} = F(<<100:16,500:16>>),
  210:              {157,77} = F(<<157:8,77:8>>),
  211:              {A,B}
  212:      end)(),
  213: 
  214:     (fun() ->
  215:              Two = id(2),
  216:              F = fun(a, <<_:(#r.a - Two)/binary,Int:8,_/binary>>) -> Int;
  217:                     (b, <<_:(#r.b - Two)/binary,Int:8,_/binary>>) -> Int;
  218:                     (c, <<_:(#r.c - Two)/binary,Int:8,_/binary>>) -> Int
  219:                  end,
  220:              1 = F(a, <<1,2,3>>),
  221:              2 = F(b, <<1,2,3>>),
  222:              3 = F(c, <<1,2,3>>)
  223:      end)(),
  224: 
  225:     (fun() ->
  226:              Bin = <<1,2,3,4>>,
  227:              F = fun(R) ->
  228:                          <<First:(R#r.a)/binary,Tail/binary>> = Bin,
  229:                          {First,Tail}
  230:                  end,
  231:              {<<>>,<<1,2,3,4>>} = F(#r{a=0}),
  232:              {<<1>>,<<2,3,4>>} = F(#r{a=1}),
  233:              {<<1,2>>,<<3,4>>} = F(#r{a=2}),
  234:              {<<1,2,3>>,<<4>>} = F(#r{a=3}),
  235:              {<<1,2,3,4>>,<<>>} = F(#r{a=4})
  236:      end)(),
  237: 
  238:     ok.
  239: 
  240: recv(_Config) ->
  241:     R = fun(Msg) ->
  242:                 self() ! Msg,
  243:                 Res = receive
  244:                           <<L,I:(L-1)/unit:8,X:32>> -> {I,X};
  245:                           <<L,I:(L-1)/unit:8,X:64>> -> {I,X}
  246:                       end,
  247:                 self() ! {tag,[Msg]},
  248:                 Res = receive
  249:                           {tag,[<<L,I:(8*(L-1)),X:32>>]} -> {I,X};
  250:                           {tag,[<<L,I:(8*(L-1)),X:64>>]} -> {I,X}
  251:                       end
  252:         end,
  253:     {1234,16#deadbeef} = R(<<3,1234:16,16#deadbeef:32>>),
  254:     {99,16#cafebeeff00d} = R(<<2,99:8,16#cafebeeff00d:64>>),
  255:     ok.
  256: 
  257: no_match(_Config) ->
  258:     B = id(<<1,2,3,4>>),
  259:     no_match = case B of
  260:                    <<Int:(bit_size(B)-1)>> -> Int;
  261:                    <<Int:(bit_size(B)*2)>> -> Int;
  262:                    <<Int:(length(B))>> -> Int;
  263:                    _ -> no_match
  264:                end,
  265:     no_match = case B of
  266:                    <<L:8,Int2:(is_integer(L))>> -> Int2;
  267:                    <<L:8,Int2:(L+3.0)>> -> Int2;
  268:                    _ -> no_match
  269:                end,
  270:     ok.
  271: 
  272: id(I) ->
  273:     I.
